entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
